tool_name: E-mail Check Invalid or Disposable Domain_v2
tool_description: Easily check if a certain e-mail address is valid. This tool verifies if the domain is valid and whether the e-mail is a temporary or disposable address, which is a common indicator of spamming or trolling.

api_list.name: mailcheck
api_list.description: Check if an e-mail domain is valid or if it is a disposable/temporary address. Invalid domains (typos, non-responding mailserver, etc.) will return 'valid: false' and 'block: true'. Disposable e-mail domains will return 'valid: true' (since it's a valid domain), but 'block: true' and 'disposable: true'.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Full e-mail address or domain to check for validity or if it is temporary/disposable. It is recommended to enter just the domain for user privacy reasons.
